teams.name: Vermont... Jeezum Crow!
teams.loan_because: From the Green Mountains to the rest of the globe, we all benefit when collectively we can contribute to improve the lives of others.

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Indiana
teams.loan_because: We believe people around the world are connected and we can make a positive difference in others' lives.
teams.description:
Indiana is the 19th U.S. state and is located in the Midwest region of the United States of America. With over six million residents, it is ranked 15th in population and 17th in population density.

Indiana is a diverse state with a few large urban areas and a number of smaller industrial cities. It is best known for the Indianapolis 500 American automobile race, held annually over the Memorial Day weekend, and a strong basketball tradition, often called Hoosier Hysteria. Residents of Indiana are called Hoosiers. The state's name means "Land of the Indians."

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world: 
http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=indiana

To see a map showing where Indiana team members are located, click the link below.

teams.name: Go New Mexico!
teams.loan_because: We are from Albuquerque,  Santa Fe, Belen, Las Cruces, Corrales, Gallup, Hobbs, Placitas, Farmington, Rio Rancho, Silver City and all around the beautiful state of New Mexico and we want to create opportunity for others.  Go New Mexico!

teams.name: California State University Chico
teams.loan_because: This is another way for Chico State to show that we care.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Entrepreneurs & Business Owners
teams.loan_because: We have a passion for seeing other people succeed and helping them to achieve total freedom and success in business.
teams.description: We are a group of entrepreneurs, business owners, and leaders who take action to change our life and the life of others.

teams.name: She Takes on the World
teams.loan_because: We want to empower entrepreneurs around the world to start businesses and create opportunities for themselves and their communities.
teams.description: She Takes on the World is a community of revolutionary women who are changing the world through entrepreneurship.

teams.name: Real Estate Investors
teams.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to help others from the fruits of our labors.
teams.description: A group of Real Estate Investors that believes it is socially responsible to help others as apart of their normal business.

teams.name: Team Fierce
teams.loan_because: we're fierce!
teams.description: The most fashion forward Kiva lending team! Be fierce and fight poverty with style!

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: San Diego Microfinance Alliance
teams.loan_because: We believe in the power of microfinance to alleviate poverty and empower the poor.  We know that microfinance creates opportunities to improve lives, not just fleeting fortunes.
teams.description:
We realize we are privileged to live and work in the beautiful city of San Diego, and we feel that compared to much of the world, we have abundant resources.  We want to share this wealth with entrepreneurs in developing countries.

We unite the microfinance community in San Diego by hosting networking events and speakers series and providing a website that serves as an events calendar, jobs board, volunteer database, community forum, and news source.

teams.description: We represent every corner of the world and this is a call to action to join our cause of sustainable poverty alleviation.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: The Evergreen Community
teams.loan_because: we love Jesus and want to participate in what He's doing in the world- bringing healing and wholeness and Good News to the poor.
teams.description: People from Portland Oregon who care.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: KivaFriends - Agriculture Loans
teams.loan_because: we want to reduce world hunger.  This includes loans for farming, livestock, poultry, and the like.
teams.description: Our group makes loans to people that create more food for those in the world.  Many of these entrepreneurs are farmers that often request loans to help them with their crops.  Many times these loans are for a longer repayment period.

teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!

teams.name: Colbert Nation
teams.loan_because: I am helping my fellow wealthy American friends lighten their swollen pockets to help the rest of the world prosper.
teams.description: Stephen Colbert is the host and executive producer of the Emmy-nominated series on Comedy Central, "The Colbert Report." Touted by the New York Times as "one of the best television shows of the year" and praised as "a must-watch show" by Entertainment Weekly, "The Colbert Report" has garnered ratings and critical success as one of the top shows on television.

teams.name: City College of San Francisco
teams.loan_because: we are a diverse and culturally integrated campus that wants to improve the global standard of living. We believe that our collective efforts have the power to make a significant difference in peoples' lives!

teams.name: Thailand
teams.loan_because:
We are the fortunate in this world that have the ability to help the working poor rise from poverty and perhaps enjoy a bit of happiness in their lives. 

With Kiva members' help these brothers and sisters, our fellow humans, have been given a ray of hope that only they can build upon for a brighter future.
teams.description: We have a very passionate core group of members who make consistent loans.  Join us today and set Thailand as your team choice.   Let's live up to the slogan "Amazing Thailand" with our generous lending activities.

teams.name: New Zealand
teams.description: Kiva Lending Team: New Zealand (KLTNZL), promoting micro financing through Kiva.org and involving New Zealanders worldwide.

teams.name: Kiva Kiwis
teams.loan_because: Because Kiwis know what it is to pull yourself  up by your bootstraps.
teams.description: Started in Oamaru New Zealand by a group of friends wanting to encourage and to make it easy for Kiwis to make loans through Kiva.

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Mounds View Public Schools
teams.loan_because: We can.
teams.description:
A community of students, teachers, families and businesses that believe
"One must care about a world one will not see."
(Bertrand Russell)

teams.name: Kiva Australia
teams.loan_because: we get this hard to describe, no-brainer sort of feeling when it comes to lending through Kiva and empowering entrepreneurs by way of small collective loans. That this is a great idea for a great cause, and whilst at times we may not have an award winning reason that we can express in words for why we're doing this, we unexceptionably just do.And we are proud to do so!
teams.description:
**UPDATE* 
After consideration, rather than have two Australia kiva lending teams, it would be better working under one group. People have inputted and I have therefore decided to stop Kiva Australia and for anyone who wishes to join an Australian team, please join team "Australia", (see link below for the team):

http://www.kiva.org/community/viewTeam/?team_id=116

teams.name: Running For Help
teams.loan_because: We need to help
teams.description: We are a running club that tries to help the world with awareness through athletics - please join our team and lets see what we can do together

teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.
teams.description:
From the Appalachian Mountains to Virginia Beach (and equally welcoming of members outside the state), we are enthusiastic Kiva lenders privileged to have ties to the great state of Virginia. 
( Photo Copyright 2007 D L Ennis all rights reserved http://dlennis.wordpress.com )

teams.name: Brigham Young University BYU
teams.loan_because: We support the growth of people, communities, and business across the globe.
teams.description: We are made up of BYU students, alumni, and friends.  We understand that everyone, whether a student or a doctor, can lend to make a difference to someone on the other side of the planet.

teams.name: Google
teams.loan_because: It's not evil!
teams.description: A group of Google employees

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: CPAide Tax & Accounting Bottom Line Challenge
teams.loan_because: Our Bottom Line is People
teams.description: We challenge Certified Public Accountants (CPAs) to join our team and make loans to entrepreneurs in developing countries so their children and families can have a better life.  Team members get a free listing in the CPAide firm directory and on CPAwho.com

teams.name: The Little Adam Memorial
teams.loan_because: Adam wanted his ashes sprinkled all over the world & we are doing this figuratively by making loans all over the world in his memory.
teams.description: Adam's family, friends and anyone else who thinks this is a good thing.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: Kiva Buddhists
teams.loan_because: We water seeds of awakening.
teams.description: We are Buddhists of all variety, but focus here is on the way of the Boddhisatva.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.description: We are people  around the world who pursue science and knowledge, and hope for a better future.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:

teams.name: Cloudspace
teams.loan_because: We are also a small business and want to help others with their small businesses.  Not to mention, this is just a wonderful cause.
teams.description: We are a small company based out of Orlando, Florida that builds online web applications/software for other businesses and individuals.

teams.name: Raj Shahani Memorial Team
teams.loan_because: This team has been created in memory of Raj Shahani who passed away in March 2010 at the tender age of 30. Raj was an active and enthusiastic Kiva lender. He had felt Kiva offered the unique opportunity to help entrepreneurs build their businesses and better their lives. We lend because we wish to continue his work. Raj's spirit will live on by our helping those in need.
teams.description: Our team is made up of friends and family members of Raj whose relentless pursuit to help others is our inspiration. Together as a team, we can and will make a difference in the world.

teams.name: Microfinance Alliance
teams.loan_because: Microloans have achieved incredible success in empowering individuals, reducing poverty, and developing communities all over the world!
teams.description: The Microfinance Alliance is a student group at the University of Minnesota that reaches out to students, faculty, and community members in the Minneapolis and St. Paul metro area. It exists to promote awareness of microfinance and connect organizations to people who want to get involved (and vice versa)! Many of its members are affiliated with the University's Carlson School of Management.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: University of Wisconsin-Madison
teams.loan_because: We believe we can make a change in this world.
teams.description: Students, staff, faculty, and alumni of University of Wisconsin-Madison get together to participate in microfinancing.  We are very enthusiastic about it.

teams.name: Cheeseheads For Change
teams.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day.  Now in the modern world, you can give that same man a loan to buy a fishing pole, he catches fish with his new pole to feed his family, his community improves because of his financial success, he pays the loan back, and  you can re-loan that money again to help someone else buy a fishing pole . . . wait, that sounds like a conspiracy by the Rapala Corporation to sell more fishing equipment, what are we supporting here ;-)
teams.description: Our Kiva lending team is a non-political group consisting of Green Bay Packers fans lovingly known as Cheeseheads, and anyone who lives in or has ties to the great state of Wisconsin and is interested in making the world a better place.

teams.name: Third Culture Kids Everywhere
teams.loan_because: As an international culture group, we know quite intimately the reality of our global interconnectedness.  We are brothers and sisters, and we are one another’s keepers.  Some of us are in need of a loan, and some of us are able to make that loan.  Kiva.org helps us to facilitate what comes next, and that is a beautiful thing.
teams.description: A third culture kid is a person who has spent a significant part of his or her developmental years outside their parents' culture. The third culture kid builds relationships to all the cultures, while not having full ownership in any. Although elements from each culture are assimilated into the third culture kid's life experience, the sense of belonging is in relationship to others of the same background, other TCKs.

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Viva Guatemala
teams.description: Anyone with a passion for supporting entrepreneurs in Guatemala

teams.name: JAMAICANS ABROAD
teams.loan_because:
Them belly full but we hungry.
A hungry mob is a angry mob.
A rain a-fall but the dirt it tough;
A pot a-cook but the food no 'nough.
.
 "Them belly full" by Bob Marley

teams.name: Management Concepts
teams.loan_because: We want to have a positive impact on people
teams.description: We are the staff, students, and alumni of Management Concepts, a professional development, training, and publishing company dedicated to unleashing the potential of people.

teams.name: Team Virginia
teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.
teams.description:
From the Appalachian Mountains to Virginia Beach (and equally welcoming of members outside the state), we are enthusiastic Kiva lenders privileged to have ties to the great state of Virginia. 
( Photo Copyright 2007 D L Ennis all rights reserved http://dlennis.wordpress.com )

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik

We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.loan_because: We want to support individuals & small sme's
teams.description: Dedicated to help others

teams.name: Johnston Heights Secondary School
teams.loan_because: We loan because we can make a difference in the world.
teams.description: We are the community of Johnston Heights Secondary School in Surrey, BC in Canada. Our goal is to promote social responsibility at Johnston Heights, and to give some insight into the power of strategic philanthropy as provided by the model of micro lending to third world entrepreneurs.

teams.name: TechHub
teams.loan_because: TechHub is a community of tech entrepreneurs and our Kiva team is a way for the TechHub community, friends and others to support entrepreneurs in need around the world.
teams.description: TechHub is the space for the technology community, launched now in London and internationally in the coming year. We aim to support the community of tech entrepreneurs and bring together all the elements of the startup ecosystem. We want to help tech startups to get better, faster.

teams.name: Florida State University
teams.loan_because: The team members want to give back to the world through Kiva loans.

teams.name: Malaysia

teams.name: Operation Launchpad
teams.loan_because:
"Give a man a fish he eats for a day, teach a man to fish and he eats for a lifetime."

Some people know how to fish and all they need is for somebody to give them a fishing rod.
teams.description: An elite group of givers.

teams.name: Indiana
teams.loan_because: We believe people around the world are connected and we can make a positive difference in others' lives.
teams.description:
Indiana is the 19th U.S. state and is located in the Midwest region of the United States of America. With over six million residents, it is ranked 15th in population and 17th in population density.

Indiana is a diverse state with a few large urban areas and a number of smaller industrial cities. It is best known for the Indianapolis 500 American automobile race, held annually over the Memorial Day weekend, and a strong basketball tradition, often called Hoosier Hysteria. Residents of Indiana are called Hoosiers. The state's name means "Land of the Indians."

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world: 
http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=indiana

To see a map showing where Indiana team members are located, click the link below.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.loan_because:

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Hard work is often not enough to escape poverty and we gladly welcome the opportunity to give people and their businesses a fighting chance. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.name: Food Matters - Vegetarians, Vegans, Raw and Friends
teams.loan_because:
We are delighted to be part of a global groundswell of interest in an organic plant based diet free of chemicals and processing.   
We are vegetarians, vegans, raw foodists and people otherwise interested in the wonderful opportunities that a healthier lifestyle or diet can provide.
teams.description:
We are inspired to help others help themselves. 


photo credit: http://www.freedigitalphotos.net/images/view_photog.php?photogid=151

Looking for delicious vegan meals that are easy to prepare? Please see website just below~!

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.loan_because:
bloggers and their readers are generous people too. You don't have to run a blog to join the group. If you do run a blog, invite your readers/fans to join the group!

teams.description: This group was created to bring together all types of Bloggers and their readers&fans who lend on Kiva.

teams.name: GOOD PEOPLE
teams.loan_because: We care about those less fortunate than we are and because we can individualize our loans - big or small - and keep lending as we are repaid.  KIVA is a great way to do something small that has a big result and is fulfilling every time you get a message from one of your recipients. It's very exciting to get an email that a loan is repaid and you can recycle your funds to help someone else on the planet. So you can start with $25 and pay it forward.
teams.description: Doing what we can to help others in some small way and hoping that it makes a difference in their lives.

teams.name: Seton Hall Students
teams.loan_because: Because we want to make a difference using in the money we saved
teams.description: We are a group of students from Seton Hall University  that have Poverty W'End's in our Journey of Transformation Class order to raise money for over Kiva Fund. During these Weekends we stop spending money on the needless and give to those in need.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

http://build.kiva.org/
